LanguageData.EtherChickenBeak.stagePatches.0.values.d: A beak graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of an chicken. They may bok and cluck about birdlike things. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.

LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stagePatches.0.value: The changes to [PAWN_nameDef]'s face continue. [PAWN_possessive] jaw has grown into a snout with a powerful bite and thick slab of muscle for a toungue.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stagePatches.1.value: A big and fuzzy snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, perfectly formed to reap trees of their leaves. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.

LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stagePatches.2.values: 커다란 꼬리로, [PAWN_nameDef]의 몸무게 전체를 지탱할 수 있을만큼 근육질입니다.

LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stagePatches.2.values.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw bones shift and crack, painfully reshaping [PAWN_possessive] face. [PAWN_possessive] nose is starting to droop, growing longer... and wriggly.
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stagePatches.3.values.descrip: A trunk graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, along with two pointy tusks, a wonderful elephantine accessory. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stagePatches.4.values.descrip: A trunk graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, along with two pointy tusks, a wonderful elephantine accessory. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.

LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.label: elephant ear
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stagePatches.0.values.d: Wow, with such a big ear, [PAWN_nameDef] looks like a dumbo, doesn't [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.label: 코끼리
A long tail that swishes gently at flies that gather.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.label: 코뿔소 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw bones shift and crack, painfully reshaping [PAWN_possessive] face. And a thick bone has begun to force its way out from the tip of [PAWN_possessive] new snout.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stagePatches.3.values: An oversized rhino jaw, complete with a mighty horn. Perfect for goring your foes. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stagePatches.4.values: An oversized rhino jaw, complete with a mighty horn. Perfect for goring your foes. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stagePatches.5.values: An oversized rhino jaw, complete with a mighty horn. Over time the horn has hardened to a tensile strength like steel. It rends flesh guts buildings alike!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.comps.0.tools.1.label: 뿔 내려침

LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stagePatches.0.values: The large and curved ear of a rhinoceros.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.label: 코뿔소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stagePatches.0.value: 짤막한 가죽끈같은 코뿔소의 꼬리. 끝에 털까지 나있습니다.
The changes to [PAWN_nameDef]'s face continue. Broad tree munching teeth have started to form in a powerful new snout.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, luxuriously fluffy and inspiring a commanding gaze. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.

LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.label: 트럼보 뿔
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stagePatches.0.values.d: Something is pressing out from below [PAWN_nameDef]'s scalp, in the middle of the forehead.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown a small hard nub on [PAWN_possessive] forehead. Maybe good for a headbutt but not much else.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown what looks like a small version of a thrumbo's horn. Not quite as sharp or powerful as a fully grown thrumbo horn, but can still inflict some damage.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stagePatches.3.values.d: A large and majestic horn near identical to what you find on a thrumbo adorns [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It is a very powerful and sharp horn.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.comps.0.tools.0.label: 트럼보 뿔
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.label: 트럼보 귀
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: A white-furred, rounded and beautiful thrumbo ear.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.label: 트럼보 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: 유연하고 매끈한 털로 뒤덮힌 푹신푹신한 트럼보의 꼬리입니다.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stagePatches.0.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a dog. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a dog. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stagePatches.2.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a dog. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally and has mastered the art of puppy dog eyes.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.label: husky muzzle
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stagePatches.1.values.desc: A fluffy dog ear flicks around at the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It is incredibly cute.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.label: husky ear
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stagePatches.1.values.des: A briskly wagging, excitable dog tail. Was that a small wag just then?
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.label: husky tail
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stagePatches.0: PAWN_nameDef의 얼굴이 개의 그것처럼 날카로운 코로 장식되어 있습니다. 그의/그녀의 치아는 그에 맞게 뾰족합니다. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 매우 어렵게 합니다.
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stagePatches.1: PAWN_nameDef의 얼굴이 개의 그것처럼 날카로운 코로 장식되어 있습니다. 그의/그녀의 치아는 그에 맞게 뾰족합니다. 그것에 적응하면서 말하기가 덜 답답해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stagePatches.2: PAWN_nameDef의 얼굴이 개의 그것처럼 날카로운 코로 장식되어 있습니다. 그의/그녀의 치아는 그에 맞게 뾰족합니다. 더 나아가 적응하면서, PAWN_nameDef는 정상적으로 말을 하고 강아지 눈망울로 기술을 완성했습니다.

LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stagePatches.1: PAWN_nameDef의 머리 양쪽에 있는 푹신한 개 귀가 움직입니다. 매우 귀엽습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.label: labrador ear
활발하고 흥분된 개 꼬리를 흔듭니다. 그것은 방금 작은 흔들림이었나요?
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverTail.label: labrador tail

LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stagePatches.0.values.de: 늑대처럼 생긴 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 붙어 있습니다. [PAWN_possessive] 이빨은 그에 어울리도록 뾰족합니다. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 매우 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.de: 늑대처럼 생긴 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 붙어 있습니다. [PAWN_possessive] 이빨은 그에 어울리도록 뾰족합니다. 그것에 적응하면서 말하기가 덜 답답해졌습니다.

LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.label: timber wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stagePatches.1.values.descr: 날카롭고 털이 복슬복슬한 귀가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리관에 자리잡고, 왼쪽과 오른쪽을 튕기면서 먹잇감의 소리를 듣습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.label: timber wolf ear
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.label: timber wolf tail
[PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has become a vicious looking snout, with large fangs visible even when their mouth is closed. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has become a vicious looking snout, with large fangs visible even when their mouth is closed. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has become a vicious looking snout, with large fangs visible even when their mouth is closed. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
[PAWN_nameDef]의 턱은 사나워 보이는 주둥이로 변했으며, 입이 닫혀 있을 때도 큰 송곳니가 보입니다. 더 적응하면서 [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundSnout.label: 지옥개 주둥이
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundEar.label: 지옥개 귀
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has become long and pointed, like that of a great canine.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundTail.label: 지옥개 꼬리
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]에게 근육질의 길다란, 끝이 뾰족한 꼬리가 자라났습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundHeadspike.label: 지옥개 머릿가시
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundSpikes.label: 지옥개 가시
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.label: 뼈 발바닥
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.description: 여러 메카나이트 효과의 끔찍한 조합으로 인해, 손의 외부가 뼈처럼 굳어버렸고, 안쪽에 있는 힘줄로 움직이게 되었습니다. 보기에도 불안한 이 손은 매우 예리한 손톱을 가지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.0.label: 짐승같은
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.0.description: 이 뼈손바닥은 평범한 동물의 발바닥 보다 뻣뻣하게 퇴화되었고, 상당히 쓸모 없습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.1.description: 각 손가락 끝마다 날카로운 발톱이 달렸습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.5.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.6.description: [PAWN_nameDef](은)는 이 뼈 손을 쓰는것에 굉장히 익숙해져, 손가락의 유연함을 되찾으려 하고있습니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.6.label: 적응함
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.7.description: Further adaptation to this bone paw has allowed it to become as dextrous as a normal hand again.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.stages.8.description: 이 뼈 손에 충분히 적응하여 유연성과 손재주를 되찾았습니다. 평범한 손보다 정교한 조작이 가능합니다.
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundPaws.comps.0.tools.0.label: 뼈 발톱

LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.de: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a warg. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stagePatches.2.values.de: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a warg. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stagePatches.3.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 턱은 사나워 보이는 주둥이로 변했으며, 입이 닫혀 있을 때도 큰 송곳니가 보입니다. 더 적응하면서 [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.label: 와르그 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.label: warg ear
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.label: 털술이 달린 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: 끝 부분에 털 뭉치가 달려있는 얇은 꼬리입니다.
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stagePatches.0.values.des: A powerful feline muzzle rests prominently on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. The occasional yawn reveals a row of dangeously sharp teeth. [PAWN_nameDef] is still figuring out how to speak with these new features.
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stagePatches.1.values.des: A powerful feline muzzle rests prominently on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. The occasional yawn reveals a row of dangeously sharp teeth. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stagePatches.2.values.des: A powerful feline muzzle rests prominently on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. The occasional yawn reveals a row of dangeously sharp teeth. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.label: 퓨마 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.label: 퓨마 귀
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stagePatches.0.values.des: 이 귀는 뾰족하고 털이 자라났습니다. 청각은 예민해졌고, 멀리서 들리는 소리에도 움찔거리며 반응합니다.
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.label: 퓨마 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stagePatches.0.values.de: 길다랗고 매끄러운 꼬리. [PAWN_nameDef](이)가 무언가에 불만족스러워 할 때 앞뒤로 흔들립니다.
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 강력한 고양이 종류의 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 두드러지게 자리잡고 있습니다. 가끔 하품할 때 시리게 날카로운 이빨이 보입니다. [PAWN_nameDef]은 이 새로운 특징으로 말하는 법을 아직 터득하고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stagePatches.1.values.descr: 강력한 고양이 종류의 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 두드러지게 자리잡고 있습니다. 가끔 하품할 때 시리게 날카로운 이빨이 보입니다. 그것에 적응하면서 말하기가 덜 답답해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stagePatches.2.values.descr: 강력한 고양이 종류의 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 두드러지게 자리잡고 있습니다. 가끔 하품할 때 시리게 날카로운 이빨이 보입니다. 더 적응하면서 [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.label: 삵 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.label: lynx ear
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 뾰족한 귀와 그 위에 자라난 털까지, 이 귀는 삵의 청각기관을 닮게 변했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.label: lynx tail
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: 다른 고양이과 동물들과는 다르게, 삵의 꼬리는 짧고 뭉툭합니다. 이제 [PAWN_nameDef]도 하나 가지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pressed out into a cat shape. They may hiss and meow more than talk. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pressed out into a cat shape. They may hiss and meow more than talk. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pressed out into a cat shape. They may hiss and meow more than talk. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.label: cat muzzle
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stagePatches.0.values.descri: a triangular, fuzzy ear graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It coils back when [PAWN_pronoun] is getting ready to pounce.
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.label: cat ear
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stagePatches.1.values.descr: A long, cat-like tail. It flicks back and forth whenever [PAWN_nameDef] is displeased with something.
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.label: 고양이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stagePatches.0.values.de: A powerful feline muzzle rests prominently on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. The occasional yawn reveals a row of dangeously sharp teeth. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stagePatches.1.values.de: 강력한 고양이과의 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 두드러지게 자리잡고 있습니다. 때때로 하품을 하면 위험할 정도로 날카로운 이빨이 드러납니다. 이에 적응하면서 말하기가 덜 답답해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stagePatches.2.values.de: 강력한 고양이과의 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 두드러지게 자리잡고 있습니다. 때때로 하품을 하면 날카로운 이빨이 드러나는데, 추가적인 적응을 거쳐 [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말을 하게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.label: panther muzzle
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.label: panther ear
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: A triangular, fuzzy ear graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It coils back when [PAWN_pronoun] is getting ready to pounce.
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.label: 흑표범 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: 길다랗고 매끄러운 꼬리. [PAWN_nameDef](이)가 무언가에 불만족스러워 할 때 앞뒤로 흔들립니다.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face continues to change, with nose, jaw, and chin, still growing outwards. It's starting to take shape as a sleek and graceful muzzle.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.1.valu: A slender muzzle graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, with a cunning smile and a silver tongue. The strange shape has made it difficult to talk, but despite this [PAWN_nameDef] has a way of getting what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.2.valu: A slender muzzle graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, with a cunning smile and a silver tongue. Adaptation, and practice, has made for quite an elegant manner of speech.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.3.valu: A slender muzzle graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, with a cunning smile and a silver tongue. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a true master of persuasion.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.label: arctic fox muzzle
A big, fuzzy, triangle ear crowns [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound it senses.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.label: arctic fox ear
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stagePatches.1.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 이어져나온 솜털처럼 보송보송한 여우 꼬리입니다. 오, 방금 살짝 살랑거린 것 같지 않나요?
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.0.descripti: A luxurious fox tail drapes from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It sweeps after them, keeping everything prim and proper!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.label: arctic fox tail
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 지속적으로 변화하고 있으며, 코, 턱, 턱끝이 점점 더 밖으로 자라나고 있습니다. 이제 매끄럽고 우아한 주둥이의 모습을 갖추어가고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.1.valu: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 이상한 모양 때문에 말하기가 어렵지만, 그럼에도 불구하고 [PAWN_nameDef]는 [PAWN_pronoun]가 원하는 것을 얻는 방법을 알고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.2.valu: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 적응과 연습을 통해 매우 우아한 말투를 갖게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.3.valu: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 추가적인 적응을 통해 [PAWN_nameDef]는 진정한 설득의 대가가 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.label: fennec fox muzzle
큰 삼각형의 푹신한 귀가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리를 왕관처럼 장식하고 있으며, 감지하는 모든 소리에 반응하여 돌아가며 후킹합니다.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.label: fennec fox ear
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stagePatches.1.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 이어져나온 솜털처럼 보송보송한 여우 꼬리입니다. 오, 방금 살짝 살랑거린 것 같지 않나요?
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.0.descripti: 호화로운 여우 꼬리가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 흘러내려와 그들을 따라다니며 모든 것을 정돈된 상태로 유지합니다!
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.label: fennec fox tail
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 지속적으로 변화하고 있으며, 코, 턱, 턱끝이 점점 더 밖으로 자라나고 있습니다. 이제 매끄럽고 우아한 주둥이의 모습을 갖추어가고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.des: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 이상한 모양 때문에 말하기가 어렵지만, 그럼에도 불구하고 [PAWN_nameDef]는 [PAWN_pronoun]가 원하는 것을 얻는 방법을 알고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.2.values.des: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 적응과 연습을 통해 매우 우아한 말투를 갖게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stagePatches.3.values.des: 날씬한 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있으며, 교활한 미소와 은색 혀가 있습니다. 추가적인 적응을 통해 [PAWN_nameDef]는 진정한 설득의 대가가 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.label: red fox muzzle
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stagePatches.1.values.descri: 큰 삼각형의 푹신한 귀가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리를 왕관처럼 장식하고 있으며, 감지하는 모든 소리에 반응하여 돌아가며 후킹합니다.
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.label: red fox ear
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 이어져나온 솜털처럼 보송보송한 여우 꼬리입니다. 오, 방금 살짝 살랑거린 것 같지 않나요?
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 호화로운 여우 꼬리가 늘어집니다. 그것은 그들을 따라 청소하면서 모든 것을 단정하고 바르게 유지합니다!
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.label: red fox tail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.label: 너구리 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stagePatches.0.values.de: A short, pointed, and bandit-masked muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stagePatches.1.values.de: A short, pointed, and bandit-masked muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stagePatches.2.values.de: A short, pointed, and bandit-masked muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.label: raccoon ear
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 평범한 귀를 대채하는 짧고 복슬복슬한 털이 난, 동그란 모양의 귀입니다.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.label: raccoon tail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 연장되어 나온 너구리의 꼬리입니다. 쓰레기 냄새를 감지하면 움찔거립니다.
LanguageData.EtherHareMuzzle.stagePatches.0.values.de: Shifting, twisting, pulsing. The painful transformation of [PAWN_nameDef]'s poor face continues. [PAWN_possessive] jaws have elongated into a snout and [PAWN_possessive] front teeth have grown longer.
LanguageData.EtherHareMuzzle.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has completely reshaped into one resembling a hare's, with a twitchy pink button nose and long buck teeth. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherHareMuzzle.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has completely reshaped into one resembling a hare's, with a twitchy pink button nose and long buck teeth. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherHareMuzzle.stagePatches.3.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has completely reshaped into one resembling a hare's, with a twitchy pink button nose and long buck teeth. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherHareMuzzle.label: hare muzzle
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stagePatches.1.values.descr: A long, furry ear sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound it senses. It is suprisingly flexible.
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.description: A long, furry, flexible ear sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound it senses. [PAWN_nameDef] hears everything, even sounds other mortals cannot hear.
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.label: hare ear
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stagePatches.1.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]의 엉덩이 바로 위에 달린 작은 솜털뭉치입니다. 이건 상당히 귀엽습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.label: hare tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareMuzzle.stagePatches.0.value: 변화하고, 비틀리고, 고동칩니다. [PAWN_nameDef]의 가련한 얼굴의 고통스러운 변화가 계속됩니다. (코드) [PAWN_possessive] 턱은 길게 늘어났고 (코드) [PAWN_possessive] 앞니는 길어졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareMuzzle.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴은 까다로운 분홍색 버튼 코와 긴 열상 모서리 이빨을 가진 토끼를 닮은 모습으로 완전히 재구성되었습니다. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 아주 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareMuzzle.stagePatches.2.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴은 까다로운 분홍색 버튼 코와 긴 열상 모서리 이빨을 가진 토끼를 닮은 모습으로 완전히 재구성되었습니다. (코드) [PAWN_possessive] 이빨은 적합하게 뾰족합니다. 그것에 적응하는 것은 말하는 것을 덜 성가시게 만들었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareMuzzle.stagePatches.3.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴은 까다로운 분홍색 버튼 코와 긴 열상 모서리 이빨을 가진 토끼를 닮은 모습으로 완전히 재구성되었습니다. (코드) [PAWN_possessive] 이빨은 적합하게 뾰족합니다. 더욱 적응하면서, [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareMuzzle.label: snow hare muzzle
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareEar.stagePatches.1.values.d: 긴 털이 보송보송한 귀가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리 위에 있어 자신이 감지하는 모든 소리를 향해 휙휙 돌고 뒤로며 귀를 기울입니다. 놀랍도록 융통성이 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareEar.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareEar.stages.0.description: 긴 털이 보송보송하고 유연한 귀가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리 위에 있어 자신이 감지하는 모든 소리를 향해 휙휙 돌고 뒤로며 귀를 기울입니다. [PAWN_nameDef]은 모든 것을 듣습니다, 심지어 다른 사람들이 들을 수 없는 소리까지도.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareEar.label: snow hare ear
[PAWN_nameDef]의 엉덩이 바로 위에 달린 작은 솜털뭉치입니다. 이건 상당히 귀엽습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnowHareTail.label: snow hare tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stagePatches.0.value: A robust beaver jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth, being able to cut trees and other plants in a few quick bites. On the other hand, those teeth make speech very difficult, and [PAWN_nameDef] has a hearty appetite.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stagePatches.1.value: A robust rodent jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth, being able to cut trees and other plants in a few quick bites. Adaptation has made speaking a little easier, but [PAWN_nameDef] still has a hearty appetite.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.stagePatches.2.value: A robust rodent jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth, being able to cut trees and other plants in a few quick bites. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] is talking normally, but still need to eat more than normal.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverJaw.label: alphabeaver snout
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.label: alphabeaver ear
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverEar.stagePatches.0.value: A fuzzy and waterproof ear has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s normal ear.
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.label: alphabeaver tail
LanguageData.EtherAlphabeaverTail.stagePatches.0.valu: A perfect rudder in most scenarios, this tail can be used to speed up construction by inventive means known only to the user of one. Also really useful for smoothing floors.
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraJaw.stagePatches.0.values.d: A robust rodent jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth well suited for gnawing, digging, and pulling up roots. On the other hand, those teeth make speech very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraJaw.stagePatches.1.values.d: A robust rodent jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth well suited for gnawing, digging, and pulling up roots. Adaptation has made speaking a little easier.
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraJaw.stagePatches.2.values.d: A robust rodent jaw has formed on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with strong front teeth well suited for gnawing, digging, and pulling up roots. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] is talking normally.
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraJaw.label: capybara snout
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraEar.label: capybara ear
LanguageData.EtherCapybaraEar.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has turned into small round capybara ear.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stagePatches.0.values.d: 튼튼한 설치류의 턱이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 형성되어 깎고, 파고, 뿌리를 잡아당기기에 아주 적합한 강한 앞니를 가지고 있습니다. 반면에 그 이빨은 말하기를 아주 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stagePatches.1.values.d: 튼튼한 설치류의 턱이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 형성되어 깎고, 파고, 뿌리를 잡아당기기에 아주 적합한 강한 앞니를 가지고 있습니다. 적응이 되면서 말하기가 조금 더 쉬워졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stagePatches.2.values.d: 튼튼한 설치류의 턱이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 형성되어 깎고, 파고, 뿌리를 잡아당기기에 아주 적합한 강한 앞니를 가지고 있습니다. 더욱 적응하면서, [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말을 하고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.label: squirrel snout
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.label: 다람쥐 귀
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has grown into a small wedge, flicking about to listen for the beating of wings.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.label: 다람쥐 꼬리
길고 폭신한 꼬리가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 허리까지 말려 올라가있습니다. [PAWN_pronoun]는 그 꼬리로 [PAWN_objective] 감싸는걸 좋아하고, 잘때에는 베개처럼 사용합니다.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has taken on the shape of rat's muzzle. Scarred and blistering skin surrounds a few chemfuel boils that push out of [PAWN_possessive] face. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.label: boomrat snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has taken on the shape of rat's muzzle. Scarred and blistering skin surrounds a few chemfuel boils that push out of [PAWN_possessive] face. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratJaw.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s jaw has taken on the shape of rat's muzzle. Scarred and blistering skin surrounds a few chemfuel boils that push out of [PAWN_possessive] face. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally. That is, if anything about this could be called normal.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.label: boomrat ear
LanguageData.EtherBoomratEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: A rounded rat like ear. Even here the skin bulges into a few pustules.
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.label: boomrat tail
LanguageData.EtherBoomratTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: A hairless rat tail, long and snaking. Sometimes it leaves a thin trail of chemfuel as it drags along the floor.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaSnout.label: chinchilla snout
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaSnout.stagePatches.0.valu: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a chinchilla, complete with oversized front teeth. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaSnout.stagePatches.1.valu: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a chinchilla, complete with oversized front teeth. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaSnout.stagePatches.2.valu: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a chinchilla, complete with oversized front teeth. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.label: chinchilla ear
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaEar.stagePatches.0.values: A large ear clad in silky smooth fur has grown from [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, giving them an irresistably cute appearance.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.label: chinchilla tail
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaTail.stagePatches.0.value: A soft, fluffy tail with luxuriously smooth fur has grown from the base of [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine, charming and tempting everyone to touch it.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigJaw.label: guinea pig snout
A whiskered snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with a cute little button nose, like that of a guinea pig. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
A whiskered snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with a cute little button nose, like that of a guinea pig. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
A whiskered snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with a cute little button nose, like that of a guinea pig. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherGuineaPigEar.label: guinea pig ear
A fluffy ear flops about on the side of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.label: rat snout
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stagePatches.0.values.desc: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a rat, complete with oversized front teeth. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stagePatches.1.values.desc: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a rat. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stagePatches.2.values.desc: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a rat. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.label: rat ear
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stagePatches.0.values.descri: A grey-furred, rounded ear listens carefully for predators.
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.label: 쥐꼬리
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 털이 없는 뾰족한 꼬리로, 마치 기다란 뱀 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearMuzzle.stagePatches.2.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face continues to change. A broad flat nose and a thick jaw have pressed out into the shape of a dangerous looking snout.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearMuzzle.stagePatches.3.va: A large bear snout has grown on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. Powerful jaw muscles and a brutal set of teeth make for a savage bite. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearMuzzle.stagePatches.4.va: A large bear snout has grown on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. Powerful jaw muscles and a brutal set of teeth make for a savage bite. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearMuzzle.stagePatches.5.va: A large bear snout has grown on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. Powerful jaw muscles and a brutal set of teeth make for a savage bite. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearMuzzle.label: grizzly bear muzzle
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearEar.stagePatches.1.value: A rounded, fuzzy ear, sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It looks rather cute.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearEar.label: grizzly bear ear
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearTail.stagePatches.1.valu: 매우 짧은, 곰의 꼬리입니다. 사실, 별로 꼬리랄만한 길이도 아닙니다. 정말로요.
LanguageData.EtherGrizzlyBearTail.label: grizzly bear tail
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴은 계속해서 변화하고 있습니다. 넓은 평평한 코와 두꺼운 턱이 위협적인 모습의 주둥이로 밀려나왔습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stagePatches.3.valu: 큰 곰 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 자라났습니다. 강력한 턱 근육과 잔인한 이빨 세트는 사나운 물기를 가능하게 합니다. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 아주 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stagePatches.4.valu: 큰 곰 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴에 자라났습니다. 강력한 턱 근육과 잔인한 이빨 세트는 사나운 물기를 가능하게 합니다. 그것에 적응하는 것은 말하는 것을 덜 짜증나게 만들었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stagePatches.5.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]([PAWN_possessive]) 얼굴에 큰 곰의 주둥이가 자라났다. 강력한 턱 근육과 날카로운 이빨 세트가 사나운 물림을 가능하게 한다. 추가적인 적응을 통해, [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.label: polar bear muzzle
[PAWN_nameDef]의 머리 위에 둥근, 털이 복슬복슬한 귀가 있다. 꽤 귀여워 보인다.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearEar.label: polar bear ear
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearTail.stagePatches.1.values: 매우 짧은, 곰의 꼬리입니다. 사실, 별로 꼬리랄만한 길이도 아닙니다. 정말로요.
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearTail.label: polar bear tail
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown out into a big lizard snout, complete with a long forked tongue. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown out into a big lizard snout, complete with a long forked tongue. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown out into a big lizard snout, complete with a long forked tongue. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.label: 이구아나 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.label: 이구아나 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back feels a bit strange, but nothing that unusual.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stagePatches.1.values.de: A small tail has appeared at the base of [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It's rapidly growing longer and thicker.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tail reaching his ankles and has become very thick. It'll take some time before [PAWN_nameDef] gets used to it.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stagePatches.3.values.de: A long, muscular tail has grown from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It's tough enough to shrug off brutal attacks and sturdy so [PAWN_nameDef] can brace against it, keeping them stable.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.description: A series of spines drapes down the back. Would look good with a spiky hairstyle
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.label: 이구아나 뿔
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stagePatches.0.values.desc: Long hollow fangs protrude from [PAWN_nameDef]'s elongated face, causing saliva to drip from between their scaly lips. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stagePatches.1.values.desc: Long hollow fangs protrude from [PAWN_nameDef]'s elongated face, causing saliva to drip from between their scaly lips. Adaptation has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stagePatches.2.values.desc: Long hollow fangs protrude from [PAWN_nameDef]'s elongated face, causing saliva to drip from between their scaly lips. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.label: snake snout
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: 송곳니
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 등이 조금 이상하게 느껴지긴 하지만, 그리 평범하지 않은 것은 아니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tail is getting longer and longer. in the same time [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs feel shorter and weaker than before
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stagePatches.3.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리를 대체하는 커다란 근육질의 꼬리입니다. 하반신이 뱀의 형상을 하고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.label: 뱀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.description: A large swooping hood engulfs the head, granting a rather intimidating look.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.label: 코브라 볏
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: 부리
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stagePatches.3.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown to have short turtle jaws, with scaly skin surrounding the thick keratin of [PAWN_pronoun] new beak. It's pretty difficult to talk without any lips.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stagePatches.4.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown to have short turtle jaws, with scaly skin surrounding the thick keratin of [PAWN_pronoun] new beak. Adaptation has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stagePatches.5.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown to have short turtle jaws, with scaly skin surrounding the thick keratin of [PAWN_pronoun] new beak. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.label: 거북이 부리
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.label: 거북이 꼬리
[PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 짧은 꼬리가 솓아났습니다. 짧아서 아무짝에도 쓸모 없지만, 바지에 구멍은 뚫어줘야 할 것 입니다.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.label: 원숭이 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has elongated into a monkey-like visage, making them look less evolved. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has elongated into a monkey-like visage, making them look less evolved. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has elongated into a monkey-like visage, making them look less evolved. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.label: monkey ear
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stagePatches.0.values.des: Though somewhat engorged, this ear looks somewhat like [PAWN_nameDef]'s own ear.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.label: 원숭이 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 이어지는 길고 유연한 꼬리. 이것은 나무를 탈때 많은 도움을 주지만, 변방계에선 아무도 나무를 탈줄 모릅니다.
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.label: cow snout
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.label: cow ear
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stagePatches.0.values.descri: A large tan ear that belongs to a cow. It flicks idly. Maybe someone should tag it.
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.label: 소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 소의 그것과 같은 꼬리입니다. 그것은 다리 아래로 늘어져 휙휙대며 파리를 쫓아냅니다.
LanguageData.EtherHorns.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stagePatches.0.values.label: curved horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stagePatches.0.values.descrip: Curved horns decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, which can easily be used to stab and puncture anyone foolish enough to tussle with [PAWN_nameDef]. They have grown larger, but still have a little more growing to do.
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stagePatches.1.values.descrip: Burly horns decorate [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. It'd be unfortunate to get too close when [PAWN_nameDef] is in a bad mood.
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloSnout.label: muffalo snout
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloEar.label: muffalo ear
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloEar.stagePatches.0.values.de: A large wooly ear that belongs to a muffalo. Who knew muffalo had ears beneath all that wool?
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.label: muffalo tail
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stagePatches.0.values.d: A muffalolike tail. It swats at flies and hangs low at their legs.
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloWooly.label: 두꺼운 털가죽
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloWooly.description: Thick fur grows over the body constantly. It can be shaved, but keeping it short is a futile effort.
LanguageData.EtherYakSnout.label: yak snout
LanguageData.EtherYakEar.label: yak ear
LanguageData.EtherYakEar.stagePatches.0.values.descri: A large wooly ears that belongs to a yak. It flicks idly.
LanguageData.EtherYakTail.label: yak tail
LanguageData.EtherYakHorns.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherYakHorns.stagePatches.0.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리를 장식하고 있는 구부러진 뿔은 쉽게 찌르고 찔러 넣을 수 있어, [PAWN_nameDef]와 다투기에 충분히 어리석은 사람을 벌 수 있습니다. 뿔은 더 커졌으나, 아직 약간 더 자랄 여유가 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherYakHorns.stagePatches.1.values.desc: Two slender horns grow from the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They're sharp and dangerous to get near if [PAWN_nameDef] happened to be in a bad mood.
LanguageData.EtherBisonSnout.label: bison snout
LanguageData.EtherBisonEar.label: bison ear
LanguageData.EtherBisonEar.stagePatches.0.values.desc: A large tan ear that belongs to a bison. It flicks idly.
LanguageData.EtherBisonTail.label: bison tail
LanguageData.EtherBisonTail.stagePatches.0.values.des: A bisonlike tail. A tuft of fur puffs out at the end.
LanguageData.EtherBisonHorns.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherBisonHorns.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherBisonHorns.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리를 장식하고 있는 구부러진 뿔은 쉽게 찌르고 찔러 넣을 수 있어, [PAWN_nameDef]와 다투기에 충분히 어리석은 사람을 벌 수 있습니다. 뿔은 더 커졌으나, 아직 약간 더 자랄 여유가 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherBisonHorns.stagePatches.1.values.de: Two short horns grow from the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They're sharp and dangerous to get near if [PAWN_nameDef] happened to be in a bad mood.
LanguageData.EtherBisonHorns.stagePatches.2.values.de: Two stout horns has emerged from the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They're very sharp and tempts [PAWN_nameDef] to use them.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into a long camel snout, with slit nostrils that can be closed to keep out sand and debris. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 긴 낙타 코로 밀려나와, 모래와 이물질을 막아주는 슬릿코를 가지게 되었습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into a long camel snout, with slit nostrils that can be closed to keep out sand and debris. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.label: alpaca snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.3.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, woolly and with lips perfect for spitting. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.4.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, woolly and with lips perfect for spitting. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stagePatches.5.values.d: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, woolly and with lips perfect for spitting. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.comps.0.tools.0.label: 침
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.comps.0.tools.1.label: gob
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.label: alpaca ear
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stagePatches.0.values.des: A wooly ear twitches idly at the wind.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.label: alpaca tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stagePatches.0.values.de: A alpaca's curly tail, it twitches when food is near.
LanguageData.EtherWooly.label: 두터운 털
LanguageData.EtherWooly.description: Thick wool grows over the torso constantly. It can be shaved without anyone's help.
LanguageData.EtherDromedarySnout.stagePatches.0.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 긴 낙타 코로 밀려나와, 모래와 이물질을 막아주는 슬릿코를 가지게 되었습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDromedarySnout.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 긴 낙타 코로 밀려나와, 모래와 이물질을 막아주는 슬릿코를 가지게 되었습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDromedarySnout.stagePatches.2.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 긴 낙타 코로 밀려나와, 모래와 이물질을 막아주는 슬릿코를 가지게 되었습니다. 추가 적응을 통해, [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDromedarySnout.label: dromedary snout
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryEar.label: dromedary ear
[PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has grown into a dromedary's ear.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryTail.label: dromedary tail
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryTail.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef] has a long thin dromedary tail.
LanguageData.EtherGoatSnout.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face now has the shape of a snout, with a long goatee and squared off teeth suitable for munching on just about everything. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherGoatSnout.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 이제 코 모양을 가지게 되었으며, 아주 다양한 것들을 먹기에 적합한 긴 수염과 정사각형 모양의 이빨을 가졌습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherGoatSnout.stagePatches.3.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face now has the shape of a snout, with a long goatee and squared off teeth suitable for munching on just about everything. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherGoatSnout.label: goat snout
LanguageData.EtherGoatEar.label: goat ear
LanguageData.EtherGoatEar.stagePatches.0.values.descr: A fluffy, caprine ear sits at the side of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, like that of a goat.
LanguageData.EtherGoatTail.label: 염소 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherGoatTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: A Goatlike tail. It's very wooly but short and not incredibly useful.
LanguageData.EtherGoatHorns.comps.0.tools.0.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherGoatHorns.label: goat horns
LanguageData.EtherGoatHorns.description: The curved horns of a goat. They start small, but will eventually grow to full size. Horn growth does not require the constant work of mutagenic mechanites.
LanguageData.EtherGoatHorns.stagePatches.1.values.des: Curved horns has grown from [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, while still not fully grown they already add heft to any unfortunate subjected to a headbutt.
LanguageData.EtherGoatHorns.stagePatches.2.values.des: Having reached full size, [PAWN_nameDef]'s horns will allow him to dominate any game of king of the hill.
LanguageData.EtherIbexSnout.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 이제 코 모양을 가지게 되었으며, 아주 다양한 것들을 먹기에 적합한 긴 수염과 정사각형 모양의 이빨을 가졌습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherIbexSnout.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 이제 코 모양을 가지게 되었으며, 아주 다양한 것들을 먹기에 적합한 긴 수염과 정사각형 모양의 이빨을 가졌습니다. 이에 적응하며 말하는 것이 덜 불편해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherIbexSnout.stagePatches.3.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 이제 코 모양을 가지게 되었으며, 아주 다양한 것들을 먹기에 적합한 긴 수염과 정사각형 모양의 이빨을 가졌습니다. 추가 적응을 통해, [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherIbexSnout.label: ibex snout
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.label: ibex ear
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stagePatches.0.values.descr: A fluffy, caprine ear sits at the side of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, like that of an ibex.
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.label: ibex tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: A tail like that of an Ibex goat. It's very wooly but short and not very useful.
LanguageData.EtherIbexHorns.comps.0.tools.0.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherIbexHorns.label: ibex horns
LanguageData.EtherIbexHorns.description: The curved horns of an ibex. They start small, but will eventually grow to full size. Horn growth does not require the constant work of mutagenic mechanites.
LanguageData.EtherIbexHorns.stagePatches.1.values.des: Long, curved horns grows from [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They are already larger than even most but still have a little more growing to do.
LanguageData.EtherIbexHorns.stagePatches.2.values.des: Incredibly long Ibex horns crowns [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, moving through doors is difficult but they add great heft to any headbutt.
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stagePatches.1.values.de: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with squared off teeth great for chewing the cud. [PAWN_nameDef] smiles sheepishly whenever [PAWN_pronoun]'s caught in a baa. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stagePatches.2.values.de: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with squared off teeth great for chewing the cud. [PAWN_nameDef] smiles sheepishly whenever [PAWN_pronoun]'s caught in a baa. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stagePatches.3.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴이 이제 코 모양을 가지게 되었으며, 아주 다양한 것들을 먹기에 적합한 긴 수염과 정사각형 모양의 이빨을 가졌습니다. 추가 적응을 통해, [PAWN_nameDef]는 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.label: sheep snout
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stagePatches.0.values.de: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face with squared off teeth great for chewing the cud. [PAWN_nameDef] smiles sheepishly whenever [PAWN_pronoun]'s caught in a baa. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.label: 양의 귀
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stagePatches.1.values.desc: A fluffy, ovine ear flicks idly at the side of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, like a sheep's.
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.label: 양 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stagePatches.0.values.des: 양같은 꼬리. 매우 포근하지만, 짧고 놀라울정도로 쓸모 없습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWoolySheep.label: 두터운 털
LanguageData.EtherWoolySheep.description: Thick wool grows over the torso constantly, different from the comparatively lighter wool that grows elsewhere. It can be shaved without anyone's help.
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.comps.0.tools.0.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.label: 숫양 뿔
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.description: 숫양의 굽은 뿔. 처음에는 작게 시작하지만, 시간이 지나면 상당히 크게 자라납니다. 뿔의 성장에는 변형 유인체 메카나이트가 필요하지 않습니다.
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리위에 난 작은 뿔로써, 박치기를 할때 상당한 무게감을 더해줍니다. 지금은 작은 뿔이고, 완전히 자라나기 전까지는 상당한 기간이 소모될 것 입니다.
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.stagePatches.1.values.de: Hefty Ram horns grows [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. While they are still growing they already add a lot of power to his attacks.
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.stagePatches.2.values.de: A pair of Burly Ram horns crowns [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. The power they add will earn respect from even the fiercest of enemy.
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherSheepHorns.stages.0.description: Magnificent horns wreathes [PAWN_nameDef]'s head like a crown. They demand reverance from animals who innately understand the owner's whims.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.label: caribou snout
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into a long caribou muzzle. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into a long caribou muzzle. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into a long caribou muzzle. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.label: caribou ear
LanguageData.EtherCaribouEar.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has grown into a large caribou ear.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouTail.label: caribou tail
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.label: caribou antlers
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stagePatches.0.value: From [PAWN_nameDef]'s head a large pair of antlers is growing under a soft felt of velvet skin. While still not fully grown they're already dangerous for being so hard.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouAntlers.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s head now sports an impressive rack with many nasty-looking spikes. Shirts are especially at risk.
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.label: elk snout
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stagePatches.0.values.descri: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown into a long elk snout with a shaggy neck beard. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stagePatches.1.values.descri: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown into a long elk snout with a shaggy neck beard. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherElkJaw.stagePatches.2.values.descri: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown into a long elk snout with a shaggy neck beard. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.label: elk ear
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.label: 순록 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stagePatches.0.values.descr: A short wooly tail hangs down from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine.
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.label: elk antlers
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stagePatches.0.values.de: Wide, imposing antlers are growing from [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. While covered under soft velvet skin the hard, quick growing bone underneath adds a lot of power to a strike.
LanguageData.EtherElkAntlers.stagePatches.1.values.de: Some might consider hunting [PAWN_nameDef] for the large rack that embellishes [PAWN_possessive] head. Hunters beware for [PAWN_pronoun] will fight back ferociously!
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.label: 폭탄 코
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stagePatches.0.value: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, snuffling and sniffing for the telltale scent of chemfuel. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stagePatches.1.value: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, snuffling and sniffing for the telltale scent of chemfuel. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stagePatches.2.value: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, snuffling and sniffing for the telltale scent of chemfuel. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.label: boomalopic ear
폭탄사슴이 귀가 있던가요? 아마도 그런 것 같습니다. [PAWN_nameDef] 한테 하나 자랐으니까요.
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.label: 화학적 젖통
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.description: A large cyst filled with chemfuel now covers the waist. It can be drained to produce chemfuel.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.label: deer snout
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has become deer-like snout with a wide nose that picks up the scents of predators. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has become deer-like snout with a wide nose that picks up the scents of predators. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has become deer-like snout with a wide nose that picks up the scents of predators. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.label: deer ear
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stagePatches.0.values.descr: A long, smooth ear of a deer sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, listening out for predators.
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.label: 사슴 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherDeerTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]의 척추에서 뻗어나온 짧은 꼬리가 위험을 감지할 때 마다 빳빳해집니다.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stagePatches.0.values.label: 새끼사슴
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.description: Burly antlers belonging to a deer.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stagePatches.1.values.label: 벅샷
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stagePatches.1.values.descr: A pair of horns are sprouting form the top of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They're covered in soft velvet but are growing bigger rapidly.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stagePatches.2.values.label: 수사슴
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stagePatches.2.values.descr: From the base of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head a tree like pair of horns has grown into an impressive rack. They're going to make short work of any hunter seeking a trophy!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.label: gazelle snout
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into graceful, narrow snout like one might find on a gazelle. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into graceful, narrow snout like one might find on a gazelle. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pushed out into graceful, narrow snout like one might find on a gazelle. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.label: gazelle ear
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear has grown into a long, pointed, gazelle ear.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.label: gazelle tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.label: gazelle antlers
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stagePatches.0.value: Slender horns are sprouting form the top of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. Already they're forming a graceful arch and add significant power to any attack.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleAntlers.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s antlers are the envy of anyone around. Far from helpless though [PAWN_nameDef] can easily dispatch of anyone that displeases them.
LanguageData.EtherBoarSnout.stagePatches.2.values.des: A flat nosed snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, good for snorting, snuffling for roots and berries, and oinking at things that [PAWN_pronoun] likes. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherBoarSnout.stagePatches.3.values.des: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, good for snorting, snuffling for roots and berries, and oinking at things that [PAWN_pronoun] likes. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherBoarSnout.stagePatches.4.values.des: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, good for snorting, snuffling for roots and berries, and oinking at things that [PAWN_pronoun] likes. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherBoarSnout.label: boar snout
LanguageData.EtherBoarEar.label: boar ear
LanguageData.EtherBoarEar.stagePatches.0.values.descr: A large, boarlike ear covered in thick bristles sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head.
LanguageData.EtherBoarTail.label: boar tail
LanguageData.EtherBoarTail.stagePatches.0.values.desc: 멧돼지의 꼬부라진 꼬리로, 송로버섯 냄새를 맡으면 꿈틀거립니다.
LanguageData.EtherPigSnout.stagePatches.2.values.desc: 납작한 코 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있어, 킁킁거리고 뿌리나 열매를 찾으며, [PAWN_pronoun]가 좋아하는 것들에게 꿀꿀대기에 좋습니다. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 매우 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherPigSnout.stagePatches.3.values.desc: 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있어, 킁킁거리고 뿌리나 열매를 찾으며, [PAWN_pronoun]가 좋아하는 것들에게 꿀꿀대기에 좋습니다. 이에 적응함으로써 말하는 것이 덜 답답해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPigSnout.stagePatches.4.values.desc: 주둥이가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 얼굴을 장식하고 있어, 킁킁거리고 뿌리나 열매를 찾으며, [PAWN_pronoun]가 좋아하는 것들에게 꿀꿀대기에 좋습니다. 더 적응함에 따라, [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPigSnout.label: pig snout
LanguageData.EtherPigEar.label: pig ear
LanguageData.EtherPigEar.stagePatches.0.values.descri: A large, pink piglike ear sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, covered in a fine hair.
LanguageData.EtherPigTail.label: 돌돌 말린 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherPigTail.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 돼지의 꼬부라진 꼬리로, 먹을게 가까이에 있으면 베베꼬입니다.
LanguageData.EtherDonkeySnout.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown a sizable snout with wide nostrils and a small set of squared off teeth, giving [PAWN_objective] quite a long face. Don't ask why. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherDonkeySnout.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown a sizable snout with wide nostrils and a small set of squared off teeth, giving [PAWN_objective] quite a long face. Don't ask why. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
LanguageData.EtherDonkeySnout.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown a sizable snout with wide nostrils and a small set of squared off teeth, giving [PAWN_objective] quite a long face. Don't ask why. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
LanguageData.EtherDonkeySnout.label: 당나귀 주둥이
LanguageData.EtherDonkeyEar.label: donkey ear
LanguageData.EtherDonkeyEar.stagePatches.0.values.des: A long, fuzzy, equine ear sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head with tufts of fur, like that of a donkey.
LanguageData.EtherDonkeyTail.label: 당나귀 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherDonkeyTail.stagePatches.0.values.de: 당나귀같은 꼬리. 이따금 주변에 있는 파리를 쳐냅니다.
LanguageData.EtherHorseSnout.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]는 크고 넓은 콧구멍과 작은 각진 이빨이 달린 상당한 크기의 주둥이를 자라게 되어, [PAWN_objective]의 얼굴을 상당히 길게 만들었습니다. 왜 그런지 묻지 마세요. 이상한 모양이 말하기를 매우 어렵게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherHorseSnout.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]는 크고 넓은 콧구멍과 작은 각진 이빨이 달린 상당한 크기의 주둥이를 자라게 되어, [PAWN_objective]의 얼굴을 상당히 길게 만들었습니다. 왜 그런지 묻지 마세요. 이에 적응함으로써 말하는 것이 덜 답답해졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHorseSnout.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]는 크고 넓은 콧구멍과 작은 각진 이빨이 달린 상당한 크기의 주둥이를 자라게 되어, [PAWN_objective]의 얼굴을 상당히 길게 만들었습니다. 왜 그런지 묻지 마세요. 더 적응함에 따라, [PAWN_nameDef]은 정상적으로 말하는 법을 배웠습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHorseSnout.label: horse snout
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.label: 말 귀
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stagePatches.0.values.desc: A long, equine ear sits atop [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, like that of a horse.
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.label: 말 꼬리
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stagePatches.0.values.des: 말같은 꼬리. 이따금 주변에 있는 파리를 쳐냅니다.
LanguageData.EtherComboHornbill.label: 코뿔새
LanguageData.EtherComboHornbill.description: 뿔과 부리가 흉물스러운 뼈 주둥이로 합쳐졌습니다. 이것은 두개골과 이어졌으며, 구멍이라곤 자그마한 한쌍의 눈구멍 밖에 남지 않았습니다.
LanguageData.EtherComboHornbill.comps.0.tools.0.label: 부리
LanguageData.EtherComboHornbill.comps.0.tools.1.label: 뿔
LanguageData.EtherComboWolfSpike.label: 늑대 가시
LanguageData.EtherComboWolfSpike.description: 이구아나의 뿔이 늑대의 주둥이 전체로 퍼졌습니다. 주둥이의 일부를 비늘로 덮고 뾰족한 뿔이 만들어졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickArm.label: thick arm
LanguageData.EtherThickArm.stagePatches.0.values.desc: This arm's muscles are growing thicker and stronger.
LanguageData.EtherThickArm.stagePatches.1.values.desc: This arm is a little clumsier, and a lot bigger.
LanguageData.EtherThickArm.stagePatches.2.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has grown a lot larger, making most tasks more difficult.
LanguageData.EtherThickArm.stagePatches.3.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has grown a lot larger, and most tasks are a little more difficult - though the impact of this has been lessened with adaptation.
LanguageData.EtherWing.label: 날개
LanguageData.EtherWing.stagePatches.0.values.descript: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm is significantly stiffer and visibly longer then before.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stagePatches.1.values.descript: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arms has gotten significantly shorter and are clad in a soft down.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stagePatches.2.values.descript: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has contorted into the shape of an avian wing, complete with hollow bones. It'll take some time for [PAWN_objective] to get used to them again.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stagePatches.3.values.descript: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has contorted into the shape of an avian wing, complete with hollow bones. [PAWN_pronoun] has adapted to using them, but the hollow bones limit [PAWN_possessive] ability to lift heavy things.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stagePatches.3.values.abilitie: Fly to somewhere on the map.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has mastered [PAWN_possessive] wings and can effortlessly fly long distances like a migratory bird. As an added bonus food is easily spottable from above.
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.abilities.0.label: 파리
LanguageData.EtherFlightlessWing.label: flightless wing
LanguageData.EtherFlightlessWing.stagePatches.0.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm is significantly stiffer and visibly shorter then before.
LanguageData.EtherFlightlessWing.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 팔이 상당히 짧아지고 부드러운 솜털로 덮여 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFlightlessWing.stagePatches.2.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has contorted into the shape of an avian wing, complete with hollow bones. It is far too small and weak to fly but has grown a lovely plumage.
LanguageData.EtherFlightlessWing.stagePatches.3.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s arm has contorted into the shape of an avian wing. It's flightless but the eye-catching plumage has become a great distraction should they find themself in a brawl!
LanguageData.EtherAvianEye.stagePatches.0.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has become sharper at range, to about 20/10 vision - though it hasn't quite got entirely used to the new visual acuity.
LanguageData.EtherAvianEye.stagePatches.1.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has become sharper at range, to about 20/4 vision, and can see detail at range that normal humans can only recognise simple shapes.
LanguageData.EtherAvianEye.label: avian eye
LanguageData.EtherAvianEye.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherAvianEye.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eagle eye can now spot targets from increadible distances. Honing instincts locks the eye on the target, allowing precise trickshots.
LanguageData.EtherCapridEye.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef] has a rectangular pupil set in a yellow eye that is pressed slightly further to the side of the head. It allows for a wider peripheral field of view, and herd animals seem a little calmer from the familiar appearance, however [PAWN_pronoun] hasn't fully adapted to the oddities of the new eye placement.
LanguageData.EtherCapridEye.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef] has a rectangular pupil set in a yellow eye that is pressed slightly further to the side of the head. It allows for a wider peripheral field of view, and herd animals seem calmed by the familiar appearance.
LanguageData.EtherCapridEye.label: caprid eye
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has grown yellow, with narrow, slitted pupil in place of the previous circle. It hasn't quite adjusted to see as well as before.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has turned a bright, feline yellow, and its pupil has become small, vertical slit. [PAWN_pronoun] can control how much the pupil can expand, allowing to see in the darkness.
LanguageData.EtherFelineEye.label: 고양이 눈
LanguageData.EtherReptileEye.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has turned a glaring yellow, and its pupil has become small, vertical slit. The receptors in the eye now catch infrared frequencies, but willl need time to distinguish between colours and volume perfectly.
LanguageData.EtherReptileEye.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has turned a glaring yellow, and its pupil has become small, vertical slit. [PAWN_pronoun] can change between infrared and visible light receptors at will, losing all weakness of both receptors.
LanguageData.EtherReptileEye.label: reptile eye
LanguageData.EtherReptileEye.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherReptileEye.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s cold eye has become incredibly sensitive to movement. In a brawl [PAWN_nameDef] never misses even a single twitch of muscle!
LanguageData.EtherVulpineEye.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eye has grown yellow, with a narrow, slitted pupil in place of the previous circle. It hasn't quite adjusted to see as well as before.
LanguageData.EtherVulpineEye.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef] has a bright, foxy eye. [PAWN_pronoun] will see better, and charm people with their exotic appearance.
LanguageData.EtherVulpineEye.label: 여우 눈
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.0.values.label: 발톱이 돋음
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.0.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발톱이 어두워지고 날카롭게 변해, [PAWN_possessive] 양말에 자꾸만 걸립니다.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.1.values.label: 푹신한 발바닥
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.1.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발가락에 발톱과 육구가 생겼습니다. [PAWN_possessive] 신발은 발에 잘 맞지 않지만, [PAWN_pronoun]는 이제 가시덤불도 맨발로 별 걱정없이 걸어다닐 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has been wholly replaced by an animalistic paw, severly hampering [PAWN_possessive] chances of ever wearing shoes again. [PAWN_pronoun] will need time to get used to it.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stagePatches.3.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has been wholly replaced by an animalistic paw, severly hampering [PAWN_possessive] chances of ever wearing shoes again.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.label: 갈라진 굽
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.0.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발톱이 눈에 띌 정도로 어두워지고 퍼졌지만, 아직 [PAWN_possessive] 발가락을 덮진 않습니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발가락들이 커다란 두개의 발가락으로 합쳐졌습니다. 각 발가락은 어두운 색의 뼈와 같은 재질로 두텁게 감싸여 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.2.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has mutated into a veritable hoof, with a split down the middle. [PAWN_pronoun] will need time to get used to it.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.3.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has been replaced by a cloven hoof. [PAWN_pronoun] is quite adept at using it and is a bit quicker than [PAWN_pronoun] used to be.
LanguageData.EtherUnclovenHoofFoot.label: uncloven hoof
LanguageData.EtherUnclovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.0.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s toes have become encased in a thin layer of carnitine, limiting [PAWN_possessive] mobility.
LanguageData.EtherUnclovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.1.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot resembles more of a hoof than anything human, and the heel is stretching painfully to match.
LanguageData.EtherUnclovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.2.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has reshaped into a singular hoof. [PAWN_pronoun] will need time to get used to it.
LanguageData.EtherUnclovenHoofFoot.stagePatches.3.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has been replaced by a hoof. [PAWN_pronoun] is quite adept at using it and is a bit quicker than [PAWN_pronoun] used to be.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterFoot.label: 쪽발
LanguageData.EtherTrotterFoot.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발톱이 어두워지고 [PAWN_possessive] 발가락을 감싸며 자라기 시작합니다. 불편하진 않지만 걱정됩니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterFoot.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발가락은 그저 검정색 발톱으로 감싸인 뼈입니다. [PAWN_possessive] 검지와 소지발가락은 발꿈치 뒤쪽을 향하고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterFoot.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발은 완전히 돼지 발처럼 되었습니다. 이것은 [PAWN_objective] 항상 하이힐을 신고 있는것처럼 보이게 합니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterFoot.stagePatches.3.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발은 완전히 돼지 발처럼 되었습니다. 이것은 [PAWN_objective] 항상 하이힐을 신고 있는것처럼 보이게 합니다.
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발은 조류의 발톱으로 대체되었습니다. 생긴것과는 달리, 보행 및 전투에 상당히 쓸모가 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발가락은 긴 새의 발톱처럼 변해 물건을 잡거나 누군가의 얼굴을 긁어버리는데 안성맞춤입니다.
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.comps.0.tools.0.label: 조류 발톱
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.label: 조류
LanguageData.EtherLargeAvianFoot.stagePatches.0.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has been replaced with a padded avian claw. Despite its appearance, it proves quite useful for normal ambulatory function as well as for combative purposes.
LanguageData.EtherLargeAvianFoot.stagePatches.1.value: [PAWN_nameDef]'s toes stretch out into large birdlike claws. The talons are sharp and can be quite dangerous in a fight.
LanguageData.EtherLargeAvianFoot.label: clawed ratite
LanguageData.EtherLargeAvianFoot.description: A large and deadly avian foot.
LanguageData.EtherRetractableClawsFoot.label: feline paw
LanguageData.EtherRetractableClawsFoot.stagePatches.0: Thick callouses have developed, and retractable claws are beginning to grow from the nail bed.
LanguageData.EtherRetractableClawsFoot.stagePatches.1: Retractable claws and thick pawpads dominate the structure of this foot, and it's beginning to stretch longer from the heel.
LanguageData.EtherRetractableClawsFoot.stagePatches.2: This foot has reshaped and elongated into a feline foot, equipped with padded soles and retractable claws. They're unfamiliar to walk on, but a lot quieter when moving around.
LanguageData.EtherRetractableClawsFoot.stagePatches.3: This foot has reshaped and elongated into a feline foot, equipped with padded soles and retractable claws. The extra spring in the step makes [PAWN_nameDef] sprightly and a lot quieter when moving around.
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.label: 파충류 발
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.description: A reptilian foot, looks like a bunch of toes glued together.
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.stagePatches.0.v: Claws are beginning to protrude from the nailbed, replacing the toenails.
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.stagePatches.1.v: Claws have fully grown, and the toes are splaying out in an odd fashion. Patches of scales are developing along the length.
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.stagePatches.2.v: Thick scales plate [PAWN_nameDef]'s clumsy foot, and large claws get in the way of movement.
LanguageData.EtherReptillianClawFoot.stagePatches.3.v: Thick scales plate [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot, and large claws get in the way of movement, but not as much as they used to.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveHoof.label: massive hoof
LanguageData.EtherMassiveHoof.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발톱이 눈에 띌 정도로 어두워지고 퍼졌지만, 아직 [PAWN_possessive] 발가락을 덮진 않습니다.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveHoof.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발은 인간의 것보다 더 말굽과 닮았으며, 뒤꿈치가 고통스럽게 늘어나고 있다.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveHoof.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has reshaped into a singular massive hoof providing firm footing in combat. It will take a while to get used to moving around on hooves though.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveHoof.stagePatches.3.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s foot has reshaped into a singular massive hoof providing firm footing in combat.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.label: stump foot
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발가락이 [PAWN_possessive] 발 안쪽으로 쪼그라들었습니다. 발 위에 남겨진 발톱만이 거기에 발가락이 있었다는걸 상기시켜 줍니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.stagePatches.1.values: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발이 뭉툭해지고, 약간 부푼것 처럼 보입니다. [PAWN_possessive] 발가락들도 전부 상아색 발톱으로 대체되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발에 있는 뼈와 근육 구조가 재구성되어, 뭉툭하고 강한 코끼리의 발처럼 변했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.stagePatches.3.values: [PAWN_nameDef]의 발에 있는 뼈와 근육 구조가 재구성되어, 뭉툭하고 강한 코끼리의 발처럼 변했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideFoot.comps.0.tools.0.label: 짓밟기
LanguageData.EtherMassiveFootClaw.label: 발톱달린 발
LanguageData.EtherMassiveFootClaw.stagePatches.0.valu: Curved claws are pressing out from the nails, but are too blunt to be of use at the moment.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveFootClaw.stagePatches.1.valu: The claws have grown larger, and have sharpened enough to prove a threat.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveFootClaw.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet have grown long, curved claws that protrude in such a way that [PAWN_pronoun] now has to walk on the sides of [PAWN_possessive] feet.
LanguageData.EtherMassiveFootClaw.stagePatches.3.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet have grown long, curved claws that protrude in such a way that [PAWN_pronoun] now has to walk on the sides of [PAWN_possessive] feet. Time has allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to adapt making it less inhibiting.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.label: 유연한 발가락
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.description: A foot that looks almost like a hand
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet are arching. Surely a message is all they need.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stagePatches.1.values.de: The toes on [PAWN_nameDef]'s feet are lengthening drastically while the sole is shrinking. Walking is proving very difficult.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s toes has lengthened to finger like protrutions with multiple dextrous joints. While walking like this is very difficult [PAWN_objective] is finding the extra grip very handy!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stagePatches.3.values.de: With practise [PAWN_nameDef]'s gotten used to the the additional "fingers". While [PAWN_objective] feet are far more sensitive than before and hinders [PAWN_objective] movement [PAWN_nameDef] can use them almost as good as his regular hands!
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.0.values.label: 발톱이 돋음
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.0.values.descr: 각 손가락 끝마다 날카로운 발톱이 달렸습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.1.values.label: 푹신한 발바닥
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.1.values.descr: 발톱 말고도, 손바닥과 손끝에 두꺼운 피질이 생성되고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.2.values.label: 뻣뻣한 앞발바닥
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.2.values.descr: 이 손은 손이라기 보단 동물의 발바닥에 더 가깝지만, 완전히 쓸모 없진 않습니다.
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.stagePatches.3.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] has largely adapted to having paws, recovered some flexibility in the digits.
LanguageData.EtherPawHand.comps.0.tools.0.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.label: 발굽
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stagePatches.0.values.desc: 각 손가락의 끝이 두꺼운 손톱으로 덮였고, 그 손톱은 서서히 손가락 전체의 크기로 커져가고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stagePatches.1.values.desc: 모든 손가락에 커다랗고 두꺼운, 발굽같은 손톱이 붙어있습니다. 손가락 몇개는 짧아진것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stagePatches.2.values.desc: 사람의 손바닥 위쪽으로, 엄지를 제외한 손가락 두개씩 하나로 합쳐졌습니다. 조작을 감소시키지만, 손 전체가 굽인것 보다는 훨씬 나아 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stagePatches.3.values.desc: [PAWN_nameDef](은)는 손굽을 쓰는데 익숙해져서, 작업하기 그나마 쉬워졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofHand.label: 발굽
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofHand.stagePatches.0.value: 각 손가락의 끝이 두꺼운 손톱으로 덮였고, 그 손톱은 서서히 손가락 전체의 크기로 커져가고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofHand.stagePatches.1.value: 모든 손가락에 커다랗고 두꺼운, 발굽같은 손톱이 붙어있습니다. 손가락 몇개는 짧아진것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofHand.stagePatches.2.value: 사람의 손바닥 위쪽으로, 엄지를 제외한 손가락 두개씩 하나로 합쳐졌습니다. 조작을 감소시키지만, 손 전체가 굽인것 보다는 훨씬 나아 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofHand.stagePatches.3.value: [PAWN_nameDef](은)는 손굽을 쓰는데 익숙해져서, 작업하기 그나마 쉬워졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.label: 쪽발
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stagePatches.0.values.d: 각 손가락의 끝이 두꺼운 손톱으로 덮였고, 그 손톱은 서서히 손가락 전체의 크기로 커져가고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stagePatches.1.values.d: 모든 손가락에 커다랗고 두꺼운, 발굽같은 손톱이 붙어있습니다. 손가락 몇개는 짧아진것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] fingers has become noticably shorter but have acquired additional receptors that percieve minute differences in heat and chemical composition. The changes may take time to get used to
LanguageData.EtherTrotterHand.stagePatches.3.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] fingers has become noticably shorter but have acquired additional receptors that percieve minute differences in heat and chemical composition, making quantifying mixtures much easier. Adaption has helped offset the difficulties [PAWN_nameDef] has in using them.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.description: This hand has reshaped to become like a paw, complete with retractable claws.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.label: 고양이과
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 손톱이 고양이의 손톱처럼 길고, 굽고, 뾰족해 졌습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 손바닥과 손가락에 두꺼운 피질이 생겨, 발톱달린 손을 더욱 더 고양이 처럼 보이게 만들었습니다. [PAWN_possessive] 엄지손가락은 약해져, 물건을 집는데 어려움을 줍니다.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stagePatches.2.values.d: 메카나이트가 [PAWN_nameDef]의 고양이 발바닥 변이에 대한 작업을 끝마쳤습니다. 하지만 아직 이 손은 이질적이고 어색해서, 익숙 해 질때까지 [PAWN_objective] 힘들게 할 것 입니다.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.stagePatches.3.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 손은 숨길 수 있는 발톱까지 달려있는, 완전한 고양이 발바닥이 되었습니다. 이것은 [PAWN_objective] 전투에 유리하게 해주지만, [PAWN_possessive] 항문을 닦기엔 불리하게 만듭니다.
LanguageData.EtherFelineClaws.comps.0.tools.0.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.label: 날개끝
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stagePatches.2.values.label: 동물화중
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have shrunken down significantly, making manipulating things much harder.
LanguageData.EtherWingTip.stagePatches.3.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have mostly disappeared into an almost-useless lump of bird-skinned flesh, with many feathers protruding from the nub.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.description: Massive, clawed paws that belong on a bear rather than a human. They are deadly in a fight, but are rather useless at fine manipulation.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.label: 거대한 발
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stagePatches.0.values.d: Each finger on this hand is tipped with a huge, sharp claw.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stagePatches.1.values.d: In addition to massive claws, [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand is has grown noticably larger and developed thick pads on the palm and each fingertips, making it look more like a paw than a hand.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stagePatches.2.values.d: A massive, five-toed paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. [PAWN_pronoun] will be useless at fine manipulation until [PAWN_pronoun] adapts to them, but at least [PAWN_pronoun] can rip things apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands, err paws.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stagePatches.3.values.d: A massive, five-toed paw with deadly claws has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand. [PAWN_pronoun] has gotten used to having five fingers and no thumb, but the huge size still makes them more clumsy than someone with smaller paws. At least [PAWN_pronoun] can rip things apart with [PAWN_possessive] bear hands, err paws.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.comps.0.tools.0.label: 발톱
