LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.label: 유연한 앞발바닥
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stagePatches.0.valu: Fine claws are developing from the nailbed here, and small callouses are growing on the fingerprintsand palm.
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stagePatches.1.valu: The fingers have slimmed and lengthed, splaying out a little with delicate claws and small pawpads growing in.
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stagePatches.2.valu: Slim fingers are tipped with delicate claws, assisting with fine motor controls.
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stagePatches.3.valu: Slim fingers are tipped with delicate claws, assisting with much finer motor controls due to further adaptation.
LanguageData.EtherGreenPawHand.label: arboreal handpaw
Slight callouses are forming over the palm and fingerprints of this hand.
The palm of this hand is calloused and should be able to pull at plants a little easier.
This hand is clawed and padded, making it a little easier to work with in the field with plants.
[PAWN_nameDef] has a 'green paw', that enables them to work a bit faster with plants in all respects. Claws are suited for digging in dirt, and pawpads are ideal for pulling at fruit.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.label: 손톱달린 손
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stagePatches.0.values: Three inch-long claws have grown out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers, and still seem to be growing.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stagePatches.1.values: The claws are growing more, replacing the fingers themselves. They're about four inches long, and are growing from the second knuckle.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stagePatches.2.values: Most of [PAWN_nameDef]'s finger real-estate has been entirely replaced by large megasloth claws. They're very sharp and get in the way for most tasks, but are rather dangerous in combat.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stagePatches.3.values: [PAWN_nameDef]의 민첩한 손가락들이 길다랗고 휜 손톱 세개로 대체되었습니다. 이 손톱은 피부나 금속을 어려움 없이 잘라낼 수 있을정도로 날카롭습니다.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.comps.0.tools.0.label: 발톱
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.description: Thick, leathery stumps have replaced this hand. Doing any kind of fine manipulation with it will be exceedingly challenging.
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.label: 뭉툭한 손
각 손가락의 끝이 두꺼운 손톱으로 덮였고, 그 손톱은 서서히 손가락 전체의 크기로 커져가고 있습니다.
Some of the fingers on this hand have disappeared entirely, while the rest are growing fatter and more inflexible. [PAWN_nameDef]'s hand isn't going to be of much use soon.
Thick, leathery stumps have replaced [PAWN_nameDef]' hand. [PAWN_pronoun] will find any any kind of fine manipulation exceedingly challenging until he gets used to them.
[PAWN_nameDef] has adapted to having stumps for hands, and will have slightly less trouble with working with them.
LanguageData.EtherElephantHand.comps.0.tools.0.label: 강타
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.label: reptile claws
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stagePatches.1.val: Sharp claws have grown from [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers, and scales are growing to cover the knuckles.
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stagePatches.2.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have elongated into scale-covered claws. They're clumsy at the moment, but may improve with further adaptation.
LanguageData.EtherReptileHandclaws.stagePatches.3.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 손가락은 길게 늘려져 비늘덮인 손톱처럼 되었습니다.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.label: 유연한 손
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands are growing short thick hairs over the top, and their fingers seem a little longer.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stagePatches.2.values.de: The topside of [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands are covered in short, thick hairs, and the fingers are elongated, like a monkey's.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stagePatches.3.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have elongated into something resembling a monkey's hand. They're a little more suited to peeling bananas.
LanguageData.EtherDiggingClaws.stages.0.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherDiggingClaws.stages.1.label: 미숙함
LanguageData.EtherDiggingClaws.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherDiggingClaws.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherDiggingClaws.label: digging claws
Thick claws are pressing out from the nailbed.
The claws are elongating, with fingers growing bulkier. They're somewhat blunt and don't appear too useful in combat.
Each finger on this hand has the top portion replaced by a thick claw. It might take some time and further adaptation to determine how this could be used.
Each finger on this hand has the top portion replaced by a thick and dense claw. It's ideal for digging away at rock and dirt.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLeg.stages.0.label: 초기
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLeg.stages.1.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLeg.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLeg.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLeg.label: 코끼리
The muscles in [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs are swelling in size and tightening.
Burly muscles have developed along this leg, and are still growing.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is thick with heavy, powerful muscle. Getting used to it will take [PAWN_pronoun] some time.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is as thick and strong as a treetrunk, greatly adding to their overall size.
LanguageData.EtherDigitgradeLeg.stagePatches.0.values: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is now more beast than human, forcing [PAWN_objective] to stand more on [PAWN_possessive] toes instead of [PAWN_possessive] heel, which has elongated. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherDigitgradeLeg.stagePatches.1.values: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is now more beast than human, forcing [PAWN_objective] to stand more on [PAWN_possessive] toes instead of [PAWN_possessive] heel, which has elongated.
LanguageData.EtherDigitgradeLeg.label: 지행동물
LanguageData.EtherUnguligradeLeg.stagePatches.0.value: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is now more beast than human, forcing [PAWN_objective] to stand more on [PAWN_possessive] nails instead of [PAWN_possessive] heel, which has elongated. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherUnguligradeLeg.stagePatches.1.value: The shape of [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg is now more beast than human, forcing [PAWN_objective] to stand more on [PAWN_possessive] nails instead of [PAWN_possessive] heel, which has elongated.
LanguageData.EtherUnguligradeLeg.label: 우제류 다리
LanguageData.EtherCervineLeg.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리 모양은 이제 인간보다 더 짐승에 가까워져 [PAWN_objective]가 [PAWN_possessive] 발톱에 더 많이 서게 하며, 길어진 [PAWN_possessive] 발뒤꿈치 때문에 새로운 형태에 익숙해지는 데 시간이 필요할 것이다.
LanguageData.EtherCervineLeg.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리 모양은 이제 인간보다 더 짐승에 가까워져 [PAWN_objective]가 [PAWN_possessive] 발톱에 더 많이 서게 하고, 길어진 [PAWN_possessive] 발뒤꿈치.
LanguageData.EtherCervineLeg.label: 사슴
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stages.0.label: 초기
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stages.1.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.label: strong avian
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.0.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg has started itching quite a lot, but nothing serious yet.
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.1.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리뼈가 새 신체구조의 필요에 따라 늘려지거나 줄어들고 있습니다. 이 변화가 일어나는 동안 움직이는것은 상당히 힘들고 고통스럽습니다.
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped into very large avian legs. They are incredibly powerful, but look strange on a humanoid. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.3.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped into very large avian legs. They are incredibly powerful, but look strange on a humanoid.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.label: 초기
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.label: 재구성중
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.label: 적응 중
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.3.label: 적응함
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.label: 토끼다리
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.0.values.label: 가려움
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.0.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리가 상당히 가렵기 시작했지만, 아직 심각한 것은 아니다.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.1.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리뼈가 새 신체구조의 필요에 따라 늘려지거나 줄어들고 있습니다. 이 변화가 일어나는 동안 움직이는것은 상당히 힘들고 고통스럽습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped to look something like a rabbit's. This helps them run away from predators, but good luck finding pants that fit. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.3.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]의 다리가 토끼의 것처럼 변했습니다. 이것은 그들의 포식자로부터 도망치는데 도움을 주지만, 맞는 바지를 찾는데에는 전혀 도움이 되질 않습니다.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.1.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] no longer has a visible ear.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear looks more and more like an animal ear hole.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.label: ear hole
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.1.values.label: 실종
LanguageData.EtherUdder.label: 젖통
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.description: 이건 정말 설명할 필요가 없어보입니다. [PAWN_nameDef](은)는 이제 우유를 짜낼 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.description: 이 심장은 더 큰 몸통에 많은 양의 혈액을 순환시키기 위해 만들어 졌습니다. 사람의 경우, 피로를 유발합니다.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.label: 강한 심장
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.0.values.d: Strong pulses are going through [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest. They are getting worse and worse.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.1.values.d: 심장이 자라나며 발생하는 고통스러운 경련이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 흉부를 가득 채웁니다.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]의 심장 크기가 커지며, 주변을 감싸는 흉강 또한 확장되었습니다. [PAWN_pronoun](은)는 더욱 자주 쉬어야 할것입니다.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.description: A large, powerful lung for intensive breathing.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.label: 강인한 폐
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.0.values: Breathing is becoming more and more difficult for [PAWN_nameDef] as [PAWN_pronoun]'s lung has started to expand.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.1.values: A painful spasm of a growing lung is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. The larger size leads to hyperventilation, causing slight dizziness.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has acquired a reinforced voicebox that can focus [PAWN_nameDef]'s breath into a roar capable of terrifying and overloading mechanical auditory sensors.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.description: An expanded frontal lobe for bright morphs.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.label: expanded frontal lobe
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.0.v: [PAWN_nameDef] is recently having more headaches than usual.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.1.v: [PAWN_nameDef]'s having a painful, constant migraine. It feels like [PAWN_nameDef]'s brain is expandiing.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.2.v: [PAWN_nameDef]'s frontal lobe has expanded. With these new connections, many problems are now trivial for [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stages.0.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s enhanced brain is so adept at logical problem solving [PAWN_objective] can solve differential equations on the fly, calculating ballistics trajectories is a comparatively simple matter.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.description: A stomach which is resilient to most germs.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.label: 강철 위장
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s stomach is sometimes hurting a bit after eating. Nothing too worrying though.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to have painful disgestion troubles, like if [PAWN_possessive] gut was evolving.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s gut is now resilient to dangerous and rotten food, and [PAWN_nameDef] could eat almost everything.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.valu: 인간의 털이라기엔 너무나도 빽빽한, 아주 얇은 털들이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위에 자라나기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.valu: This limb has been entirely covered by a coat of light fur.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.valu: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.label: light fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.values.de: 인간의 털이라기엔 너무나도 빽빽한, 아주 얇은 털들이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위에 자라나기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.values.de: 이 부위에는 누덕누덕 자라난 털가죽으로 인해 드러난 피부가 얼마 남지 않았습니다.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 사지 전체를 털이 덮어 부드럽고 고운 코트를 형성하여 따뜻함을 유지하는 데 도움이 된다.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.label: 부드러운 털로 뒤덮인
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.val: 인간의 털이라기엔 너무나도 빽빽한, 아주 얇은 털들이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위에 자라나기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.val: This limb has been entirely covered by a thick coat of arctic-proof fur.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.val: [PAWN_nameDef]의 사지 전체를 털이 덮어 부드럽고 고운 코트를 형성하여 따뜻함을 유지하는 데 도움이 된다.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.label: 극지 털가죽
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.valu: 인간의 털이라기엔 너무나도 빽빽한, 아주 얇은 털들이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위에 자라나기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.valu: A thick and dense coat of fur covers this limb. It'll need a lot of brushing to keep it neat and tidy.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 사지 전체를 털이 덮어 부드럽고 고운 코트를 형성하여 따뜻함을 유지하는 데 도움이 된다.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.label: 두터운 털가죽
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.va: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.va: 인간의 털이라기엔 너무나도 빽빽한, 아주 얇은 털들이 [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위에 자라나기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.va: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.va: Beautiful white fur coats this limb, thick and long. It could even be braided, if [PAWN_pronoun] was willing.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.va: [PAWN_nameDef]의 사지 전체를 털이 덮어 부드럽고 고운 코트를 형성하여 따뜻함을 유지하는 데 도움이 된다.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.label: thumbo fur
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.0.values.desc: 이 부위의 피부는 평범한 사람들의 피부보다 약간 더 강인해 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.1.values.desc: 이 부위의 피부는 평범한 사람들의 피부보다 상당히 더 강인해 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.2.values.desc: 이 부위의 피부가 두꺼워 지며 거칠고 두꺼운 가시같은 털들이 자라났습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.3.values.desc: 이 부위의 피부는 평범한 사람들의 피부보다 훨씬 더 강인하고, 그 위는 두껍고 억센 털들로 완전히 덮였습니다.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.4.values.desc: A leathery hide has formed over this limb, adding some natural defense.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.label: 가죽
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.0.values: 이 부위의 피부는 평범한 사람들의 피부보다 약간 더 강인해 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.1.values: 이 부위의 피부는 평범한 사람들의 피부보다 상당히 더 강인해 보입니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.2.values: 이 부위의 피부가 두꺼워 지며 거칠고 두꺼운 가시같은 털들이 자라났습니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.3.values: 매우 거칠고, 두꺼운 가죽같은 피부가 온 몸을 뒤덮고 있어 자연적으로 상당한 방어력을 더해줍니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.4.values: 온 몸에 두꺼운 가죽이 형성되어 약간의 자연적인 방어력을 더해줍니다.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.label: 두꺼운 가죽
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.0.va: All of [PAWN_nameDef]'s hair on this part has started to fall out, and [PAWN_pronoun]'s skin itches severely.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.1.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin in this limb has become drier, and is fragmenting into sprouts of scales.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.2.va: The sprouts in this limb have grown into hard clusters of rough scales, allowing [PAWN_nameDef] to disperse heat from the body.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.3.va: The clusters are spreading even more through the skin, almost covering all the [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.4.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin in this limb has turned into a layer of scales
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.label: 비늘
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.0.values: This limb appears to be covered in gooseumps as prickles of feathery quills are poking through the skin in places.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.1.values: Quills have begun to develop feathers in patches over the skin here.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin looks like a moulting chicken, with patchy sections of feathers contrasting with [PAWN_possessive] skin.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.3.values: Much of the skin here is covered in feathers, needing to be preened and attended to with the occassional dust bath.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.4.values: The skin here is entirely covered in feathers, needing to be preened and attended to with the occassional dust bath.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.label: 깃털 달린
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.label: 털
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 피부는 전보다 털이 많아진 것 같습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위를 덮어가는 털들이 빠르게 두꺼워 지고 있습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.2.values.de: 이 부위에는 누덕누덕 자라난 털가죽으로 인해 드러난 피부가 얼마 남지 않았습니다.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.3.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 신체부위에 자라난 털가죽이 점점 두터워져, 아래있는 살갗이 보이질 않습니다. 약간 곱슬곱슬 해보이기도 하네요.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.4.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]의 부위를 곱슬곱슬한 털이 완전히 덮었습니다. 상당히 따듯합니다.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.label: flexible spine
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back hurts a bit. Nothing too bad.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.1.values: [PAWN_nameDef] has difficulties controlling [PAWN_possessive] balance. It hurts whenever [PAWN_pronoun] is moving.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine has become flexible. [PAWN_pronoun] would likely win a contortion contest.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.label: reinforced spine
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]의 등이 조금 아프다. 그렇게 심하진 않다.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.1.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back is very painful, like if [PAWN_possessive]'s spine was rearranging.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine is stronger than ever. [PAWN_pronoun] is now able to carry a lot, and fast!
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.label: 혹
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strange ache in their back. Nothing too bad though.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.1.values: Reserves of fat has been diverted to [PAWN_nameDef]'s back where a noticiable hump has emerged. It'll keep [PAWN_objective] fed in a pinch.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hump has grown so that [PAWN_objective] can go days without food. The increased circulation also helps [PAWN_objective] cool off.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.description: A thick and scaled shell. The ultimate cumbersome defense on the Rimworld!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.label: tortoise shell
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.0.values: Thick plates of bone are beginning to grow out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest and back.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.1.values: The two halves of the bone plates have formed a precursor shell around [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. It's still fragile at the moment, but thickening constantly.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.2.values: A thick and scaled shell for unmatched protection against predators encases [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. [PAWN_pronoun] has a strange urge to live in a sewer.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.label: 파라곤
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.description: With rigorous acclimation training [PAWN_pronoun] has regained speed and dexterity beyond [PAWN_objective] could have dreamed! [PAWN_possessive] dreams to to live in a sewer and a study martial arts.
LanguageData.EtherHypermyofibrilization.description: A torso with extremely dense muscles, which is able to lift heavier objects with ease.
LanguageData.EtherHypermyofibrilization.label: hypermyofibrilization
[PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are growing thicker by the second.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are much thicker and bulkier. They're dense with veins and raw power. Such an impressive growth is very painful.
[PAWN_nameDef] is a veritable wall of raw power and strength, owing to the powerful mutagen coursing through [PAWN_possessive] veins.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.description: A tough torso, capable of resisting a lot more force than the average torso.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.label: tough torso
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso seems to be a little bulkier than before.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is tougher and could shrug off a firm hit easily. However, the quick muscle growth is too painful for [PAWN_nameDef] to be useful yet.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is practically made of metal given how tough it is. [PAWN_pronoun] is a brick wall of muscle.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.description: A slim and quite frail torso.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.label: Diminutive torso
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.0.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is beginning to slim and shed excess weight. Eating more doesn't seem to have any effect.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.1.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is becoming slimmer than before, making them easy to pick up. The weight draining is quite hurtful.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.2.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body is quite a bit slimmer than before. They'd be easy to push over in a fight, and don't stand as much of a chance in combat as before.
LanguageData.EtherPneumatizedSkeleton.label: pneumatized skeleton
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones ache slightly. They seem to be getting somewhat lighter.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are feeling lighter with every passing hour. They're slightly more fragile and are causing pain to [PAWN_nameDef].
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are light and maneuverable. They're denser than human bones, but contain air pockets to reduce the overall weight.
